sentences.english: The Libyan government says three of the Libyan leader's grandchildren also died.
sentences.chinese: 利比亞政府表示，利比亞領袖的三個孫子也被炸死。

sentences.english: But NATO said they killed the anti-government militants.
sentences.chinese: 但是北約稱他們炸死的是反政府武裝分子。

sentences.english: Foliaceous commander on the spot scamper is dead, adjutant Ling Hui is blood sufferred serious injury all over.
sentences.chinese: 葉司令當場炸死，副官凌輝渾身是血受了重傷。

sentences.english: Three soldiers were killed and 15 wounded.
Al Qaeda’s Yemeni branch acknowledged Mr. Anbari’s death.
sentences.chinese: 基地組織也門分支承認了安巴力先生已經被炸死。

sentences.english: Earlier that day, a young man had been vaporized by an exploding rocket.
sentences.chinese: 就在當天早些時候，一個年輕人被火箭彈炸死。

sentences.english: Blast those dirty, sneaking Rogues with your Turkey Shooter.
sentences.chinese: 用你的火雞槍炸死那些骯髒委瑣的潛伏者。

sentences.english: Hewas killed by an improvised explosive device.
sentences.chinese: 他被一個簡易製作的炸彈炸死。

sentences.english: The bomb blast killed several harmless passers-by.
sentences.chinese: 那顆炸彈炸死了幾個無辜的過路人。

sentences.english: The terrorists were killed when their bomb detonated unexpectedly.
sentences.chinese: 那些恐怖分子的炸彈意外爆炸時他們被炸死了。

sentences.english: Salvador Puig Antich: That bomb killed me as well.
sentences.chinese: 炸彈就好像也把我炸死了。

sentences.english: The other is less destructive, killing only those in the immediate vicinity.
sentences.chinese: 另外一種破壞力要小些，只是將附近的直接目標炸死。

sentences.english: Another four died the same day when their patrol was bombed in the northeast region of Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 另外四名士兵在同一天於巴格達城東北巡邏時被炸死。

sentences.english: A man and a 14-year-old girl were killed in the blast, RIA Novosti news agency reported.
sentences.chinese: 據俄新社報道，一名男子和一個14歲的女孩被炸死。

sentences.english: But his 2-year old adopted daughter was killed.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他收養2歲的女兒卻被炸死了。

sentences.english: Many people were killed, including the adopted daughter of Colonel Gadhafi.
sentences.chinese: 許多人被炸死，其中包括卡扎菲的養女。

definition: to blow up/to destroy with explosives
